entry.title: Please Notice Me, Mr. Wayne!
entry.summary:
Author: alohamoron

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 19,301Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 210

Summary: Clark Kent is a clumsy journalist with a big problem. He has been obsessed with Gotham’s billionaire Bruce Wayne for months, and that obsession is slowly turning into something more like genuine romantic admiration. Determined to get closer, he hatches a plan to have Batman deliver his messages to Bruce Wayne without ever saying a word himself. Of course, nothing goes as planned. Signals get hilariously crossed, schemes backfire, and Clark ends up tangled up in more chaos with Batman while still obsessing over Bruce. He has no idea that Bruce and Batman are actually the same man.

entry.title: the world is brighter than the sun, now that you're here
entry.summary:
Author: Kayjime

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,149Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 14

Summary: Bruce breathes, letting the air whistle quietly through his nose. He doesn’t open his eyes just yet, taking a moment to feel the sliver of golden sunlight peeking through the curtains as it streaks across the bed. It falls across his back, warming the top of his spine and the nape of his neck. It’s rare for Gotham to experience such a picturesque morning like this, especially in the midst of autumn.And then—the briefest shuffle of movement. Something akin to a smile tugs at his lips, and Bruce opens his eyes.This, he thinks. This is the problem.Because a reasonable person shouldn’t enjoy being trapped in a time loop.Bruce has dealt with many things that go beyond the realm of science - and out into the mystical and magical. However, he's...never found himself enjoying it quite like this.For Superbat Week 2025. Day 1: How to win the time war | Time Loop

entry.title: Just Another Cliché Story
entry.summary:
Author: DaniDany

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 75,267Chapters: 18/?Kudos: 283

Summary: Bruce Wayne didn’t want to attend that public high school with its worn-out halls, loud teenagers, and curious eyes that clung to his skin like needles. But Alfred insisted. “Make friends,” he said. “Spend time with kids your age.”As if age was the only thing they had in common.Bruce walked into that school expecting to remain invisible. He didn’t expect to see blue eyes looking back at him with a strange mix of kindness and danger. He didn’t expect someone like Clark to talk to him more than once. He didn’t expect... to feel.What followed wasn’t love at first sight. It was the collision of two worlds bound to fall apart—One built of steel.The other, of shadows.And even though he knew it would hurt, for the first time in years, Bruce Wayne didn’t run.

entry.title: Father(s) of the Year
entry.summary:
Author: RavenRavell

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,010Chapters: 1/2Kudos: 41

Summary: Even after a year of dating, Clark and Bruce are still taking things slow—especially so when it comes to Clark finally meeting Bruce’s eight-year-old adopted son, Dick. They decide it would be best if Clark only showed up as Superman, pretending to just be a friend, while Dick adjusted to another new change.And yet, it’s not long before Dick and Superman are so close they're sharing secrets. One of those secrets just so happens to be that Dick believes his very much gay father is, in fact, homophobic.

entry.title: Boy, You're an Alien.
entry.summary:
Author: fzanchikk

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,224Chapters: 4/8Kudos: 128

Summary: ______________________________________ "So you're telling me," Bruce says, voice dangerously low, "That I'm the first person who's ever had you like this?" He steps forward, forcing Clark back against the ledge again. One hand cups his jaw, thumb brushing over those kiss-swollen lips. "Not some random hook-up. Not a fling." His breath hitches—just slightly. "Me." A beat. "...You really are a fucking alien."______________________________________ Bruce Wayne gets the opportunity to teach a fellow Kryptonian on how to properly love, but is it really teaching when he's also experiencing genuine love for the first time? ______________________________________

entry.summary:
Author: hamsimok

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,987Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 71

Summary: “Soo..” Clark says, looking at the leather case in the backseat. “You didn’t bring much with you,” “I don’t think I’ll stay more than a day,” Bruce replies. “Wouldn’t that be a waste? You flew all the way here. You can crash as long as you want at mine, a month even-” “That I know, Clark. But I'm very busy” That ends it. Clark fixes his eyes on the road. Stupid, stupid, he thinks.

entry.title: call your mom
entry.summary:
Author: psycheion

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 24,875Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 261

Summary: The red fabric pooled in his hands, strong but unbelievably soft. Bruce itched to know what it was made out of. Would the fibers match anything on Earth? What would it look like under a microscope? Was it flame retardant? Could it be torn or damaged? How was it able to stop bullets and still be this... soft?"It was my baby blanket." Clark hummed.Bruce stopped breathing.It transformed from the cape of the strongest man on the planet into an infant's swaddle; a relic of a dead world, a soft token of a mother's love that was strong enough to keep her baby safe thirty-three years later. Bruce hadn't cried in almost eighteen years, but tonight, he was about to break that streak.
